title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 173.2 - Civil actions against foster parents, indemnification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 173.2 - Civil actions against foster parents, indemnification

State Regulations

For purposes of saving harmless and protecting foster parents
from financial loss arising out of any civil actions or judgments brought
against them for alleged acts resulting in personal injury during the discharge
of their duties, foster parents will be considered as employees pursuant to

Executive Law, section 501-a. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
173.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
